name: nocopyrightsounds-api
description: A webscraper for the NoCopyrightSounds website to provide an API

scripts.build: tsc --module CommonJS --outDir dist/cjs; tsc --module ESNext --outDir dist/esm; cp -r src/api dist/cjs/api; cp -r src/api dist/esm/api
scripts.buildWatch: tsc --watch --module CommonJS --outDir dist/cjs; tsc --watch --module ESNext --outDir dist/esm
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean; npm run build; npm run prettier

author: KaninchenSpeed
